titleStmt.title: Paracelsus his Aurora, & treasure of the philosophers· As also the water-stone of the wise men; describing the matter of, and manner how to attain the universal tincture. Faithfully Englished· And published by J. H. Oxon.
Aurora thesaurusque philosophorum. English.
titleStmt.author: Paracelsus, 1493-1541.
J. H.
Böhme, Jakob, 1575-1624. Correspondence. English. Epistle 23.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for Giles Calvert, and are to be sold at the Black Spred Eagle, at the west end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: A translation of: Aurora thesaurusque philosophorum.
"The water-stone of the vvise men" is a translation of the twenty-third epistle of Jakob Böhme.
With a preliminary errata page and three final advertisement pages.
Reproduction of the original in the Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: the Black Spred Eagle, at the west end of Pauls
